casebody.data:
Paul PAINTER
v.
NORTH CAROLINA DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY, et al. No. 393P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 5th of November 2018 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of November 2018 by Plaintiff to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of November 2018 by Plaintiff to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."
